ruleEngine.rules.atomicRules

Class CheckIsEmptyPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • ruleEngine.rules.atomicRules.CheckIsEmptyPath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRule

    public class CheckIsEmptyPath
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRule
    Check if a move performed from a unit to its destination is clear from obstacles or next units.
    Valid if the path is clear, invalid otherwise.
    See Also:
    MoveRules
